p: Your letter of the 17th is exciting indeed. I look forward to the copy of A BUNDLE OF MYRRH from the University of Missouri. It would be wonderful if you could enrich our collection here with a bequest of a copy of DIVINE ENCHANTMENT. I shall be eternally grateful and so will the University.
We are trying a selected list list of booksellers in an aggressive attempt to fill some of the major gaps in my collection, and I shall advise you of results.
Do you plan to be at the Lincoln, Nebraska address throughout the winter?
